summary.span: 为工作流的单个实例提供宿主。

span.span: Provides a host for a single instance of a workflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类为单个工作流实例提供宿主。The class provides a host for a single workflow instance. 它是由工作流运行时管理的实际工作流实例的代理。It is a proxy to the actual workflow instance that is managed by the workflow runtime. 的用户可以通过调用 对象中的适当方法，指示工作流运行时在工作流实例上执行操作。Users of can instruct the workflow runtime to perform actions on a workflow instance by calling the appropriate methods on a object. 如果请求的操作无效，则引发异常。If a requested action is not valid, an exception is thrown. 使用 ，可以执行以下任务：Using you can perform the following tasks: 1. 创建新的工作流实例，或从实例存储区中加载工作流实例。Create a new workflow instance, or load a workflow instance from an instance store. 2. 提供扩展以供工作流实例内的活动使用。Provide extensions to be used by activities within a workflow instance. 3. 控制工作流实例的执行。Control the execution of a workflow instance. 4. 恢复由工作流实例内的活动创建的书签。Resume a bookmark created by an activity within a workflow instance. 5. 保留或卸载工作流实例。Persist or unload a workflow instance. 6. 接收工作流实例生命周期事件通知。Be notified of workflow instance lifecycle events. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 承载一个工作流。The following example hosts a workflow using . 该示例使用指定的工作流定义构造 ，处理所需的工作流生命周期事件，并通过调用 来调用工作流。A instance is constructed using the specified workflow definition, the desired workflow lifecycle events are handled, and the workflow is invoked with a call to . 完成工作流时，会向控制台显示以下输出。When the workflow is completed, the following output is displayed to the console. ```Output Starting the workflow. Workflow 593976e8-558d-4989-94d6-50a14b34fd7b Idle. Ending the workflow. Workflow 593976e8-558d-4989-94d6-50a14b34fd7b Completed Workflow 593976e8-558d-4989-94d6-50a14b34fd7b Unloaded. ``` [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#9)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用 承载一个工作流。The following example hosts a workflow using . 实例是使用由单个 `DiceRoll` 活动组成的工作流定义构造的。A instance is constructed using a workflow definition consisting of a single `DiceRoll` activity. `DiceRoll` 活动包含两个表示掷骰子操作结果的输出自变量。The `DiceRoll` activity has two output arguments that represent the results of the dice roll operation. 工作流完成时，将在 处理程序中检索输出，并向控制台显示以下输出。When the workflow completes, the outputs are retrieved in the handler, and the following output is displayed to the console. ```Output Workflow aae3fb48-7229-4737-b969-d63e131b96b3 Completed. The two dice are 1 and 5. ``` [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#130](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#130)] [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#21)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用 承载一个工作流。The following example hosts a workflow using . 实例是使用工作流定义构造的，该工作流定义包含采用两个输入参数的单个 `Divide` 活动，以及一个包含两个要传递的值的输入参数字典（由参数名键控）。A instance is constructed using a workflow definition consisting of a single `Divide` activity that takes two input arguments, and a dictionary of input arguments containing the two values to be passed, keyed by argument name. 将处理所需的工作流生命周期事件，并通过调用 来调用工作流。The desired workflow lifecycle events are handled, and the workflow is invoked with a call to . 完成工作流时，会向控制台显示以下输出。When the workflow is completed, the following output is displayed to the console. ```Output Workflow 8dc844c1-bbf8-4b21-a9a2-05f89e416055 Completed 500 / 36 = 13 Remainder 32 Workflow 8dc844c1-bbf8-4b21-a9a2-05f89e416055 Unloaded. ``` [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#120)] [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定取消操作是否成功，请调用 。To determine whether the cancel operation was successful, call . 可以从 方法的内部或外部调用 `callback`。 can be called from inside or outside of the `callback` method. 如果在取消操作完成前调用 ，则此调用将会被阻止，直至取消操作完成。If is called before the cancel operation completes, it blocks until the cancel operation completes. 默认情况下，取消操作必须在 30 秒内完成，否则将在 中引发 。By default, the cancel operation must complete in 30 seconds or a is thrown from . 此方法使用 异步设计模式以异步方式取消工作流。This method cancels a workflow asynchronously using the asynchronous design pattern. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步编程概述](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定取消操作是否成功，请调用 。To determine whether the cancel operation was successful, call . 可以从 `callback` 参数中指定的方法的内部或外部调用。 can be called from inside or outside of the method specified in the `callback` parameter. 如果在取消操作完成前调用 ，则此调用将会被阻止，直至取消操作完成。If is called before the cancel operation completes, it blocks until the cancel operation completes. 如果在 `timeOut` 参数指定的时间间隔内未完成取消操作，则将在 中引发 。If the cancel operation does not complete in the interval specified by the `timeOut` parameter, a is thrown from . 此方法使用 异步设计模式以异步方式取消工作流。This method cancels a workflow asynchronously using the asynchronous design pattern. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步编程概述](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm).

A reference to the asynchronous operation

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可运行实例是指计时器或实例锁已过期的实例。A runnable instance is an instance for which a timer or instance lock has expired. 若要确定加载操作是否成功，请调用 。To determine if the load operation was successful, call . 可以从 方法的内部或外部调用 `callback`。 can be called from inside or outside of the `callback` method. 如果在恢复操作完成前调用 ，则此调用将会被阻止，直至恢复操作完成。If is called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation completes. 默认情况下，恢复操作必须在 30 秒内完成，否则将在 中引发 。By default, the resume operation must complete in 30 seconds or else a is thrown from . 此方法使用 异步设计模式以异步方式加载工作流。This method loads a workflow asynchronously using the asynchronous design pattern. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步编程概述](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可运行实例是指计时器或实例锁已过期的实例。A runnable instance is an instance for which a timer or instance lock has expired. 若要确定加载操作是否成功，请调用 。To determine if the load operation was successful, call . 可以从 方法的内部或外部调用 `callback`。 can be called from inside or outside of the `callback` method. 如果在恢复操作完成前调用 ，则此调用将会被阻止，直至恢复操作完成。If is called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation completes. 如果加载操作未在指定的超时间隔内完成，则将在 中引发 。If the load operation does not complete within the specified time-out interval a is thrown from . 此方法使用 异步设计模式以异步方式加载工作流。This method loads a workflow asynchronously using the asynchronous design pattern. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步编程概述](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步编程概述](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm). 如果工作流实例以前是从保留结果加载的，则用于加载工作流的相同 将用于保留结果。If the workflow instance was previously loaded from persistence, then the same used to load the workflow is used for persistence. 如果工作流已创建但未保留，则在调用此方法之前必须配置 ，否则，在调用此方法时将引发 。If the workflow was created and has not yet been persisted, then an must be configured before calling this method or else an is thrown when this method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定保留操作是否成功，请调用 。To determine whether the persist operation was successful, call . 可以从 参数中引用的方法的内部或外部调用 `callback`。 can be called from inside or outside of the method referenced in the `callback` parameter. 如果在保留操作完成前调用 ，则此调用将会被阻止，直至保留操作完成。If is called before the persist operation completes, it blocks until the persist operation completes. 如果保留操作未在 30 秒内完成，则将在 中引发 。If the persist operation does not complete within 30 seconds, a is thrown from . 如果工作流实例以前是从保留结果加载的，则用于加载工作流的相同 将用于保留结果。If the workflow instance was previously loaded from persistence, then the same used to load the workflow is used for persistence. 如果工作流已创建但未保留，则在调用此方法之前必须配置 ，否则，在调用此方法时将引发 。If the workflow was created and has not yet been persisted, then an must be configured before calling this method or else an is thrown when this method is called. 此方法使用 异步设计模式以异步方式保留工作流。This method persists a workflow asynchronously using the asynchronous design pattern. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步编程概述](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定恢复操作是否成功，请调用 。To determine if the resume operation was successful, call . 可以从 方法的内部或外部调用 `callback`。 can be called from inside or outside of the `callback` method. 如果在恢复操作完成前调用 ，则此调用将会被阻止，直至恢复操作完成。If is called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation completes. 默认情况下，恢复操作必须在 30 秒内完成，否则将在 中引发 。By default, the resume operation must complete in 30 seconds or else a is thrown from . 此方法使用 异步设计模式以异步方式恢复书签。This method resumes a bookmark asynchronously using the asynchronous design pattern. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步编程概述](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm).

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查传递给 实例的 处理程序的 。The following code example inspects the passed into the handler of a instance. 在此示例中，进入空闲状态的工作流包含一个由名为 的活动所拥有的名为 `EnterGuess` 的 `ReadInt`。In this example the workflow going idle has one with a name of `EnterGuess`, owned by an activity named `ReadInt`. 此代码示例基于[如何：运行工作流，该工作流](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/how-to-run-a-workflow)是[入门教程的一部分 [ .NET Framework 4.5 ] ](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/getting-started-tutorial)。This code example is based off of [How to: Run a Workflow](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/how-to-run-a-workflow), which is part of the [Getting Started Tutorial [.NET Framework 4.5]](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/getting-started-tutorial). 如果修改了该阶段中的 处理程序以包含此示例中的代码，则将显示以下输出。If the handler in that step is modified to contain the code from this example, the following output is displayed. ```Output BookmarkName: EnterGuess - OwnerDisplayName: ReadInt ``` [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置当前工作流实例遇到未处理的异常时调用的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当未在工作流中处理异常时， 和 都将指示运行时的行为；但 可以选择将已挂起的工作流保留在持久性存储区中，而 无法做到这一点。Both and dictate the behavior of the runtime when an exception is not handled in the workflow; however, has the option of leaving a suspended workflow in the persistence store, while does not. 原因在于，对已挂起的工作流执行的操作是特定于宿主的，而 则相反。The reason for this is that what happens to a suspended workflow is host-specific, and is not. 若要使用 实现此功能，请创建一个具有此行为的自定义 。To implement this functionality using , create a custom that has this behavior. ## Examples 下面的示例调用了引发异常的工作流。The following example invokes a workflow that throws an exception. 工作流未处理异常，并且 处理程序已被调用。The exception is unhandled by the workflow and the handler is invoked. 将检查 以提供有关异常的信息，且终止工作流。The are inspected to provide information about the exception, and the workflow is terminated. [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#1)]

Workflow 593976e8-558d-4989-94d6-50a14b34fd7b Completed Workflow 593976e8-558d-4989-94d6-50a14b34fd7b Unloaded. ``` [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，与 不同，此方法将仅在工作流未在指定的时间内启动的情况下（而不是需要在指定的时间内完成）超时。Note that unlike , this method will time out only if the workflow doesn't start in the specified amount of time, rather than needing to complete in the specified amount of time. 原因在于， 以同步方式执行工作流（阻止主机线程），而 以异步方式执行工作流（仅在启动工作流所需的时间内阻止主机线程）。The reason for this is that executes the workflow synchronously (blocking the host thread), while executes asynchronously, only blocking the host thread for the amount of time it takes the workflow to start. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 承载一个工作流。The following example hosts a workflow using . 该示例使用指定的工作流定义构造 ，处理所需的工作流生命周期事件，并通过调用 来调用工作流。A instance is constructed using the specified workflow definition, the desired workflow lifecycle events are handled, and the workflow is invoked with a call to . 完成工作流时，会向控制台显示以下输出。When the workflow is completed, the following output is displayed to the console. ```Output Starting the workflow. Workflow 593976e8-558d-4989-94d6-50a14b34fd7b Idle. Ending the workflow. Workflow 593976e8-558d-4989-94d6-50a14b34fd7b Completed Workflow 593976e8-558d-4989-94d6-50a14b34fd7b Unloaded. ``` [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，卸载操作必须在 30 秒内完成，否则将引发 。By default, the unload operation must complete in 30 seconds or a is thrown. 如果工作流实例以前是从保留结果加载的，则用于加载工作流的相同 将用于保留结果。If the workflow instance was previously loaded from persistence, then the same used to load the workflow is used for persistence. 如果工作流已创建但未保留，则在调用此方法之前必须配置 ，否则，在调用此方法时将引发 。If the workflow was created and has not yet been persisted, then an must be configured before calling this method or else an is thrown when this method is called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是[NoPersistScope 活动](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/nopersistscope-activity)示例的一部分。The following code example is part of the [NoPersistScope Activity](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/nopersistscope-activity) sample. 在本示例中，工作流处于空闲状态，并且主机应用程序正在等待用户输入。In this example, the workflow is idle and the host application is waiting for user input. 如果用户选择卸载，将调用 。If the user chooses to unload, is called. 如果卸载成功，将保留工作流，并从内存中卸载工作流。If successful, the workflow is persisted and unloaded from memory.
